#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned  long long int ulli;
int main()
{
	int flag,Test_cases,N;
	ulli S,E,x,y;
	cin >> Test_cases;
	while(Test_cases--)
	{
		cin  >> S >> E >> N;
		flag=0;
		while(N--)
		{
			cin >>  x >>  y;
			if((x<S && S< y ) || (x<E && E < y) || (x==S && y==E) )
			{
				//cout << "NO" <<  endl;
				flag=1;
				//break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		    cout << "NO" <<  endl;
		else
			cout << "YES" << endl;
	} 
	return 0;
}
